name: stretchgpt-userstyle
description: A collection of configurable ChatGPT enhancements - CSS userstyle

scripts.lint: echo 'Note: CSS linting skipped due to LESS preprocessing complexity. Use compile-test for syntax validation.'
scripts.compile-test: mkdir -p /tmp && cp StretchGPT.userstyle.css /tmp/test-compile.less && echo '@stretchFactor: 2; @enableChatBubbleStretch: 0; @hideDisclaimer: 0; @enableColorization: 1; @enableColorizeComposer: 1; @enableColorizeBubble: 1; @enableColorizeBubbleAndBg: 0; @colorPreset: "#76b583"; @enableColorPicker: 0; @pickerColor: "#599c7b";' | cat - /tmp/test-compile.less > /tmp/test-with-vars.less && lessc /tmp/test-with-vars.less --lint
scripts.validate: npm run compile-test && npm run lint

author: m1kethai
